摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

com.lkh.cflow.client
类 MWFClient

java.lang.Object
  com.lkh.cflow.client.MWFClient

public class MWFClient
extends java.lang.Object

MWFClient is a MWF Restful API wrapper class. MWFClient use Apache HttpComponents to invoke http request to MWF Server.

版本：
0.9
作者：
Nean

public MWFClient()
方法详细信息

newClient

public static MWFClient newClient(java.lang.String hostname)
Initiate a MWFClient instance.

参数：
hostname - The hostname of MWF server, for example, "www.myworldflow.com"
返回：
a MWFClient instance

setHost

public void setHost(java.lang.String hostname)
Set the hostname of MWF server

参数：
hostname - the hostname of IP of MWF server

deleteWft

public boolean deleteWft(java.lang.String acsk,
                         java.lang.String wftid)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
Delete a workflow template on MWF server

参数：
acsk - current access session key
wftid - the id of workflow template to be deleted.
返回：
true if deleted successfully.
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

deleteProcess

public boolean deleteProcess(java.lang.String acsk,
                             java.lang.String prcid)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
Delete a process (workflow instance) by id

参数：
acsk - current access key
prcid - the id of process to be deleted
返回：
true if deleted successfully
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

doTask

public java.lang.String doTask(java.lang.String acsk,
                               java.lang.String prcid,
                               java.lang.String nodeid,
                               java.lang.String sessid,
                               java.lang.String option,
                               java.lang.String attachments)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
Do a task. When a task is done, MWF will drive the process to move forward.

参数：
acsk - current access key.
prcid - the id of the process which the task belong to.
nodeid - the nodeid of the current task, which is the id of it's corresponding workflow node.
sessid - the sessid of current task
option - the option value you provided.
attachments - the attachments to this task.
返回：
the sessid of next task if the current task is done successfully.
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

login

public java.lang.String login(java.lang.String user_id,
                              java.lang.String user_password)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
Login and get access key to MWF

参数：
user_id - user's id
user_password - user's password
返回：
the access key. Access key must be provided for following API calls to interact with MWF server. Access key is expired in 30 minutes.
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

参数：

返回：
a JSONObject represents user profile attributes.

accessKey -

startWorkflow

public java.lang.String startWorkflow(java.lang.String accessKey,
                                      java.lang.String startby,
                                      java.lang.String wftid,
                                      java.lang.String teamid,
                                      java.lang.String instanceName)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
Start a workflow. The corresponding process will be created

参数：
accessKey - current access key
startby - the id of the starter
wftid - the id of tempalte
teamid - the id of team members of which will participate in the process.
instanceName - give the newly created process a instance name
返回：
the id of the newly created process
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

                                                  java.lang.String prcid)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception

参数：

prcid - the id of the process

a JSONObject contains all process contextual varialbes and their values.

java.lang.Exception

                                   java.lang.String teamMemo)
                            throws java.lang.Exception

accessKey - current access key

addTeamMembers

public java.lang.String addTeamMembers(java.lang.String accessKey,
                                       java.lang.String teamid,
                                       java.lang.String memberships)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
Add multiple members to a team

参数：
accessKey - current access key
teamid - the id of the team
memberships - memberships description in JSON format. For example; {"USER_ID1":"USER_ROLE1", "USER_ID2":"USER_ROLE2"} It's better to construct a JSONObject like this:
JSONObject members = new JSONObject();
members.put("U3307", "Approver");
members.put("U3308", "Auditor"); client.addTeamMembers(accessKey, teamid, members.toJSONString());
返回：
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

                          java.lang.String teamid)
                   throws java.lang.Exception

参数：
accessKey - current access key
teamid - id of the team to be deleted
返回：
true if success
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

public org.json.simple.JSONArray getProcessesByStatus(java.lang.String accessKey,
                                                      java.lang.String status)
                                               throws java.lang.Exception
Get processes by status

参数：
accessKey - current access key
status - process status, should be one of "running", "suspended", "finished", "canceled"
返回：
a JSONArray of processes.

java.lang.Exception

addUsersToOrg

public java.lang.String addUsersToOrg(java.lang.String accessKey,
                                      java.lang.String orgid,
                                      java.lang.String userkvs)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
Add many users to an organization

参数：
accessKey - current access key
orgid - id of the organization
userkvs - a String in JSON format, for example:
String userIds = "{\"USER1\":\"member\", \"USER2\":\"member\",\"USER3\":\"member\",\"USER4\":\"member\"}" ;
client.addUsersToOrg(accessKey, orgid_1, userIds);
返回：
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

                                 java.lang.String orgid,

参数：
accessKey - current access key
orgid - id of the organization
userid - id of the user to be removed from organization

java.lang.Exception

sameOrgxFed

public boolean sameOrgxFed(java.lang.String accessKey,
                           java.lang.String usr1,
                           java.lang.String usr2)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
Determine if usr1 and user2 belongs to one organization or organizations in one federation

参数：
accessKey -
usr1 - id of user
usr2 - id of another user
返回：
true or false
抛出：
java.lang.Exception
